Room.Name: Leviathan Drive
Room.ShortDescription: You are traveling along Leviathan Drive, just east of the Avatar Ruins.
Room.LongDescription: On the east side of the road, you can see a large park formed between Leviathan on the west and Orchard on the north. The park, or more appropriately, forest, seems to be deserted. Not even animals are wandering around in the patch of trees and birds fly completely around the square of land all together.
